text_block_list.text:
At lunchtime, students are crowding into the school store.
At the very back of the line are Matikanetannhauser and the others.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
...I shall now convey the oracle from the White Key-sama.
O-Machi-san is——

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Gulp...! W-what about me...?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Today, as always, it's a Great Luck Fever!
Especially during lunchtime, there are signs of good fortune!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Whoaaaaaa!!
So that means I can eat the popular bread that's always selling out!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Melon bread, cream bread, carrot pa~n♪
Pan-pa-pa-paan!

text_block_list.name: School Store Auntie
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, everyone~!
Melon bread, cream bread,
and carrot bread are all sold out~~!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Huh, whaaat!?
But it was supposed to be Great Luck...!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Th-that's strange...
Did I make some mistake in the fortune-telling method...?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No, no, it's fine!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
It just means the Great Luck I'm grasping
isn't about bread!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Let's try going to the cafe next!
Wait for me, my luck~~♪

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Ah, please wait~!

Curious about Matikanetannhauser and the others,
I decided to follow them.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Wow, look at this!
This sign!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
"New Menu: Stewed Carrot Hamburger,"
limited to 10 servings...!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
This must be it! Today, O-Machi-san is
destined to grasp this rare lunch!

And so, the two of them lined up
and waited for their turn to order, but...

text_block_list.name: Cafe Auntie
text_block_list.text:
Sorry about that~.
The limited lunch is all sold out~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh!? Sold out here too!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Whaaat!? Wh-what does this mean!? Shiraoki-sama's fortune telling not once, but twice!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Happiness is right in front of my eyes! This is strange, really!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer. ...You saw that, huh.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well~, being just one step away from reaching it is... kinda like my usual self, you know... ahaha.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But, but—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Lunch break isn't over yet! The bread and limited lunch were sold out, but that means an even luckier lunch is waiting!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Aaaaaah! I see, that's what it was!! The key is O-Machi-san's indomitable fighting spirit...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Facing adversity with a positive heart! This must have been the fortune telling that calls for super big luck!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yes, Fuku-chan senpai! It's definitely a super rare lunch now!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But, where should we go to eat it? Hmmmm.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Where do you think it is, Trainer? The super rare lunch!
choice_data_list: Let's boldly head back to the school store!
Let's wait patiently for luck to come

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I see~, going back to basics, huh. That might be good!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Yes! The original oracle said 'Good fortune lies at the school store'!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh dear~, completely sold out. Where's that super rare lunch...

text_block_list.name: School Store Auntie
text_block_list.text: Oh, you two came at just the right time! Actually, some newly released bread just arrived~. Want to try a sample?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Hmm, this is... 'Super Delicious Muscat Bread'!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Amazing! The fruit aroma is so strong~!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Let's eat~~♪
The two savored the delicious bread that no one had tasted before!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I see, with me as I am now, luck comes to me instead.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Let's also perform a prayer to summon even more fortune! Hmmmmmm...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Lunch time, munch munch chomp! Kyoooooooooey!

text_block_list.name: Cafe Auntie
text_block_list.text: Oh my, you two. Haven't you had lunch yet?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: That's right. I'm so hungry~.

text_block_list.name: Cafe Auntie
text_block_list.text: If you'd like, why not have my bento? I was taste-testing lunch and got too full.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wow, spring rolls, hamburg steak, oden... The side dishes are packed!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: If it's the auntie's bento, it's guaranteed delicious! So this is what the oracle meant!
Matikanetannhauser and the others enjoyed an ultra-rare bento!
